quagga.input.subject: (MS-20) NOTICE OF INTENTION TO TRANSFER MEMBERSHIP
quagga.input.body:
Member Services
Notice No. MS-20
April 9, 2001


COMMODITY EXCHANGE, INC.

NOTICE OF INTENTION TO TRANSFER MEMBERSHIP

Notice of Intention to Transfer Membership has been posted on the bulletin=
=20
board of the Exchange by:


Mark Cricco (MEC-7995)


In connection therewith, notification of any claims against the=20
aforementioned individual arising out of transactions executed on the=20
Exchange up to the close of business on April 9, 2001, must be submitted to=
=20
the Corporate Secretary's Office within ten (10) days.

Inquiries regarding the above should be directed to the Member Services=20
Department at (212) 299-2370.



NAME CHANGE FOR CLEARING MEMBER FIRM

Please be advised that the Exchange has been notified that effective April =
2,=20
2001, Geldermann, Inc. (#358) has changed it=01,s name to Man International=
 Inc.

Furthermore, be advised that the Exchange has been notified that effective=
=20
April 2, 2001, E.D.F. Man International Inc. (#330) has changed it=01,s nam=
e to=20
Man Financial Inc.

Inquiries regarding the above should be directed to the Member Services=20
Department at (212) 299-2370.



__________________________________________________

quagga.input.clean_body:
Member Services
Notice No. MS-20
April 9, 2001


COMMODITY EXCHANGE, INC.

NOTICE OF INTENTION TO TRANSFER MEMBERSHIP

Notice of Intention to Transfer Membership has been posted on the bulletin
board of the Exchange by:


Mark Cricco (MEC-7995)


In connection therewith, notification of any claims against the
aforementioned individual arising out of transactions executed on the
Exchange up to the close of business on April 9, 2001, must be submitted to
the Corporate Secretary's Office within ten (10) days.

Inquiries regarding the above should be directed to the Member Services
Department at (212) 299-2370.



NAME CHANGE FOR CLEARING MEMBER FIRM

Please be advised that the Exchange has been notified that effective April 2,
2001, Geldermann, Inc. (#358) has changed it=01,s name to Man International Inc.

Furthermore, be advised that the Exchange has been notified that effective
April 2, 2001, E.D.F. Man International Inc. (#330) has changed it=01,s name to
Man Financial Inc.

Inquiries regarding the above should be directed to the Member Services
Department at (212) 299-2370.
